lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.question: What promise did Jesus make to His disciples before He died?
answers: To send an army of angels
To build them a new temple
To give them lots of gold

questions.question: How did Jesus say the Holy Spirit would help them?
answers: Help them remember what Jesus said and taught
Make it so they never sinned again

questions.question: Where were the disciples on the morning of Pentecost?
answers: Fishing on the Sea of Galilee

questions.question: What did the disciples hear and see when the Holy Spirit came?
answers: A great wind and tongues of fire
A boom and a bright light

questions.question: What miracle happened when the Holy Spirit came?
answers: They spoke in languages they didn’t know
They floated up into the clouds

questions.question: Some people in the crowd thought they were speaking strangely because they were…
What did Joel promise about 800 years before that day?
answers: God would pour out His Spirit
God would make people speak one language

questions.question: What did Peter preach to the crowd about?
answers: The good news that Jesus was the Messia
Why the people were horrible sinners
The story of David and Goliath

questions.question: When the people asked, 'What should we do?' what did Peter say?
How many people believed and were baptized that day?
